solution_line_template: The {number_of_people} friends had meals worth {meal_cost_per_person} * {number_of_people} = <<{meal_cost_per_person}*{number_of_people}={total_meal_cost}>>{total_meal_cost} dollars

If they paid for the meals only, they would have remained with {initial_money} - {total_meal_cost} = <<{initial_money}-{total_meal_cost}={remaining_money_after_meals}>>{remaining_money_after_meals} dollars.

Dividing the remaining amount by the number of ice cream scoops gives {remaining_money_after_meals}/{number_of_people} = <<{remaining_money_after_meals}/{number_of_people}={cost_per_scoop}>>{cost_per_scoop} dollars.
